title: The Final Confrontation
description: Edward Scissorhands faces off against Caspian, using his skills and allies to take down the vampire leader. Lila fights alongside him, weakening Caspian's defenses with her powers.

sections.name: The Battle Begins
sections.description: Edward and Lila sneak into the castle, making their way through winding corridors and secret passages to reach Caspian's throne room. Jasper and Emily provide crucial information on the vampire leader's weaknesses, while Sarah rallies the humans in the nearby city squares. As they approach the throne room, Edward can feel the weight of his scissorhands and the determination of Lila by his side.

sections.name: Lila's Power
sections.description: With Lila's powers, she creates a force field that protects them from Caspian's attacks. Meanwhile, Edward takes down vampires one by one with his scissorhands, making progress towards the leader. The vampire guards are relentless and put up quite an impressive fight.

sections.name: Caspian's True Form
sections.description: As they near Caspian's throne room, Lila uses her powers to weaken the force field surrounding him. Edward then enters the room and faces off against his arch-nemesis. But little does he know that Caspian is hiding a secret - one that could change everything.

sections.name: The Final Showdown
sections.description: Edward and Lila work together to take down the vampires, but they are vastly outnumbered. In a desperate bid to turn the tide of battle, Edward uses his scissorhands to cut through the chains holding Caspian's true form captive. The leader is then free to unleash its full fury on them.
